main_definition: gba is not a commonly recognized idiom in English, but it may be an acronym or abbreviation.

meanings_and_examples.example: The film 'Avengers: Endgame' had the highest Global Box Office revenue in history.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not Available / Does Not Apply (N/A or D/A)
meanings_and_examples.example: Please note that this coupon does not apply to GBA items.
